恋する.english_translation: to fall in love; to be in love (with); to pine for

恐れ入る.english_translation: to be sorry; to be much obliged; to be embarrassed (polite, formal apology or thanks)

恥じらう.english_translation: to feel shy; to blush; to be bashful

恥じる.english_translation: to feel shame; to be ashamed (of); to be disgraced

恰度.english_translation: just right; exactly; precisely (same as 丁度)
恰度.russian_translation: в самый раз; точно; как раз

恵む.english_translation: to bless; to show mercy; to favor; to give charity to

悟る.english_translation: to attain enlightenment; to perceive; to realize (suddenly)

悩ます.english_translation: to worry; to torment; to harass; to distress

悩み.english_translation: worry; trouble; deep concern; source of distress

悪.english_translation: evil; badness; vice; wrong (moral or quality)

悪日.english_translation: unlucky day; inauspicious day (in the Japanese calendar)

悲観.english_translation: pessimism; despair; taking a gloomy view

情勢.english_translation: state of things; conditions; situation (often political or international)
